query.value:
SELECT obsr_Spot_Code, to_char(now()- INTERVAL '1 day','YYYY-MM-DD') AS begin_Date
,to_char(now(),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS end_Date 
FROM cd_ods.tb_apis_agri_weather_spot_code_t
;

preCopyScript.value:
delete from  cd_ods.tb_apis_agri_weather_t      
 WHERE  date_time = to_char(now(), 'YYYY-MM-DD')
 and obsr_Spot_Code = '@{item().obsr_Spot_Code}'
 ;

query.value:
select obsr_Spot_Code,  to_char(now(), 'YYYY-MM-DD') as date  
, to_char(now(), 'hh2400') AS time    
from cd_ods.tb_apis_agri_weather_spot_code_t 
   ;

select CMONTH2 as cmonth      
       from CD_ODS.APS_SDC_PW_MST
       where  BASE_DATE  = DATE(NOW()) - interval '1 MONTHS'
      group by cmonth2 
      order by cmonth

source.query:
SELECT 
  to_char(date_trunc('month', dd), 'YYYYMM') AS std,
  to_char(date_trunc('month', dd), 'YYYY12') AS edt,
  hscode
FROM generate_series(
    '2020-01-01'::date,
    date_trunc('month', CURRENT_DATE),
    interval '1 year'
) dd
CROSS JOIN (
    VALUES 
      ('0201'),
      ('0202'),
      ('0203'),
      ('0207141010')
) AS hs(hscode)
;

query.value:
SELECT item_code 
, CASE WHEN item_code  = '0000000' THEN regid
       ELSE obsr_Spot_Code 
       END AS obsr_Spot_Code
, to_char(now(),'YYYYMMDD0600') AS tmFc, regid 
FROM cd_ods.tb_kimchi_material_weather_area_t
WHERE to_char(now(), 'mm-dd') BETWEEN begindate AND enddate 
;

SELECT item_code , obsr_Spot_Code, to_char(now(),'YYYYMMDD') AS base_date
, x, y
FROM cd_ods.tb_kimchi_material_weather_area_t
WHERE to_char(now(), 'mm-dd') BETWEEN begindate AND enddate 
AND COALESCE(obsr_Spot_Code ,'') !=''
UNION ALL
SELECT '0000000' AS item_code, obsr_Spot_Code, to_char(now(),'YYYYMMDD') AS base_date
, x, y FROM 
(
SELECT a.obsr_spot_code , a.obsr_spot_nm , b.areano  , c.x, c.y
FROM cd_ods.tb_apis_agri_weather_spot_code_t a
JOIN cd_ods.tb_kimchi_area_mapping_t b
ON a.obsr_spot_code  = b.code 
AND b.gbn  = '4'
LEFT JOIN cd_ods.tb_apis_area_master_t c
ON b.areano  = c.areano 
) a
;

source.query:
WITH codes AS (
    SELECT 'US' AS statcd, '0201' AS hsSgn
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 'US', '0202'
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 'US', '0203'
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 'AU', '0201'
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 'AU', '0202'
    UNION ALL
    SELECT '', '0207141010'
),
years AS (
     select  to_char(now() - interval '1 month' * 12,'yyyymm') as strtYymm      
        ,to_char(now() - interval '1 month' * 1,'yyyymm') as endYymm
)
SELECT 
    c.statcd,
    c.hsSgn,
    y.strtYymm,
    y.endYymm
FROM codes c
CROSS JOIN years y
ORDER BY c.statcd, c.hsSgn, y.strtYymm, y.endYymm
;
